title: singAra vaDivElavan
sahitya:
singAra vaDivElavan sIraDiyE shatam enru cikkenap-piDi manamE sikkal talam Ongum


anupallavi

  mangAda ezhiluDanE pongum pugazhuDanE engum tanakkiNai illA arum tuNai tarum


caraNam    shen kadir sUriyan jyOtiyai mIrinavan mangaiyar iruvarin manam kavar maNavALan 
gangai vAridanai shaDai tangavE tAngum shankaranArkk-iniyan ainkaraunkk-iLaiyan
